doc:
Peter Benson (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Benson_(actor) 0 Peter Henry Benson (3 April 1943 – 6 September 2018) was a British actor, best known for his role as Bernie Scripps in the popular ITV television series Heartbeat, a police drama set in the fictional Yorkshire village of Aidensfield during the 1960s. He also had a number of other film and television roles, often playing weak or vacillating characters. Peter_Henry_Benson ( 3_April_1943 – 6_September_2018 ) was a_British_actor , best_known for his_role as Bernie_Scripps in the_popular_ITV_television_series_Heartbeat , a_police_drama set in the_fictional_Yorkshire_village of Aidensfield during the_1960s . He also had a_number of other_film_and_television_roles , often playing weak or vacillating characters .
